T14nagcitpu:3: varadāṃ ca mayā natvā kriyate jayamaṃgalam // NCit_1.1 //

T14nagcitpu:51: dayāṃ yadi na kuryāstvaṃ śaktiman guṇavan nṛpa /

T14nagcitpu:75: na śakyate na śakyate yama āha punaḥ punaḥ /

T14nagcitpu:111: rupamālikha bho rājan sarvalokahitāya vaṃ // NCit_1.53 //

T14nagcitpu:125: dharmanītiḥ suvijñāya na nindet kāmapi prajām /

T14nagcitpu:132: jātyā balena dānena naipuṇyena ca vidyayā // NCit_1.63 //

T14nagcitpu:138: puruṣaṃ vacanaṃ tyājyam āghātaṃ visṛjet sadā /

T14nagcitpu:141: vidhiyaṃ naiva kāryaṃ hi yamasyāpi tato nṛpa // NCit_1.67 //

T14nagcitpu:148: balena tejasā cāpi tapasemaṃ guṇaṃ nṛpāḥ /
T14nagcitpu:150: bhavān mahāyaśasvī ca karaṇīyo mayā kṣitau /
T14nagcitpu:151: nivartasva kumārgebhyas tvaṃ sadā pṛthivīpate // NCit_1.72 //
T14nagcitpu:154: prajāpatitulaḥ pṛthvāṃ yaśasvī tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi // NCit_1.74 //

T14nagcitpu:160: adya prabhṛti taccitra jagadvandyaṃ bhavet sadā // NCit_1.77 //

T14nagcitpu:166: sarve nemuśca bhaktyā taṃ brahmāṇaṃ lokapālakam // NCit_1.80 //

T14nagcitpu:175: sarvarūpānukūlaṃ tat mānaṃ vā kīdṛśaṃ bhavet /

T14nagcitpu:178: citrasya lakṣaṇāni me nānāvidhāni santi ca // NCit_1.86 //
T14nagcitpu:179: parimāṇaṃ kimasya syāt vidhinā kīdṛśena vā /
T14nagcitpu:181: brahmātha prāha bhūpendraṃ śṛṇu rājan samāhitaḥ /
T14nagcitpu:182: atiguhyaṃ mahad vākyaṃ paramaṃ kathayāmi te // NCit_1.88 //
T14nagcitpu:184: tataḥ prajā mayā sṛṣṭā upadiṣṭāśca tā mayā // NCit_1.89 //
T14nagcitpu:186: vedāccitraṃ prajātaṃ vai tasmād jñeyaṃ tathaiva tat // NCit_1.90 //
T14nagcitpu:191: yathā nareṣu bhūpendras tathā citraṃ kalāsu vai // NCit_1.92 //
T14nagcitpu:194: tathaiva citrakarmaṇi kalāḥ sarvāḥ samāśritāḥ // NCit_1.93 //
T14nagcitpu:195: himālayo yathā śreṣṭho nageṣu sakaleṣu ca /

T14nagcitpu:198: tathā śreṣṭhaṃ bhaveccitraṃ sarvāsu hi kalāsu ca // NCit_1.95 //
T14nagcitpu:199: nagnajid gaccha tasmāt tvaṃ viśvakarma samīpataḥ /

T14nagcitpu:202: viśvakarmasamīpe tu prasanno hyagamad drutam // NCit_1.97 //
T14nagcitpu:204: ātithyaṃ vidhivat kṛtvā rājñe so 'dadadāsanam // NCit_1.98 //
T14nagcitpu:206: citrasya lakṣaṇaṃ karma upadiśatu me prabho // NCit_1.99 //
T14nagcitpu:207: vidhirvā parimāṇaṃ vā kīdṛśaṃ vā bhavettathā /

T14nagcitpu:214: nirdiṣṭaṃ citralakṣaṇaṃ buddhimantaḥ kṛte śṛṇu // NCit_1.103 //

T14nagcitpu:252: ime devāḥ prasannāśca svaptākāraṃ ca lebhire /

T14nagcitpu:254: prāha saptasurān brahmā astu puṇyaṃ samāśritam /

T14nagcitpu:258: manuṣyeṣu ca yo nāma bhavantaṃ pūjayiṣyati /

T14nagcitpu:315: karṇārandhrasya cāroha ekāṅgulo bhaved dhruvam // NCit_3.15 //

T14nagcitpu:322: bhaye śoke ca bhrūprāntāv unnatau kramikau smṛtau /

T14nagcitpu:327: dvyaṅgulau hyakṣikoṣaḥ syān netramadhyaṃ tathaiva tu // NCit_3.21 //
T14nagcitpu:331: yad bhavettasya mānaṃ syād yavatrayapramāṇakam // NCit_3.23 //
T14nagcitpu:338: kāmināṃ ca tathā strīṇāṃ netraṃ matsyodaraṃ bhavet /

T14nagcitpu:345: rājannetat vijānīyād yathā syāt netralakṣaṇam // NCit_3.30 //
T14nagcitpu:348: vilikhayet tathā dhīmān citraśāstreṣu dīkṣitaḥ // NCit_3.31 //
T14nagcitpu:357: ārohaḥ ṣaḍyavastasya oṣṭha ekāṅguliḥ smṛtaḥ // NCit_3.35 //
T14nagcitpu:369: pañcāṅgulaṃ tu gaṇḍodhvaṃ adhaḥ syāt caturaṅgulam /
T14nagcitpu:370: civukasya tathā mānaṃ caturaṅgulakaṃ matam // NCit_3.41 //
T14nagcitpu:372: caturasraṃ mukhaṃ pūrṇaṃ prasannaṃ cārulakṣaṇam // NCit_3.42 //
T14nagcitpu:373: trikoṇā kuṭilā vṛttā naiva kāryā mukhākṛtiḥ /
T14nagcitpu:374: krodhayuk roṣayuk caiva na mukhaṃ syāt kadācana // NCit_3.43 //
T14nagcitpu:376: susampanno bhaviṣyati nara iha ca sarvadā // NCit_3.44 //
T14nagcitpu:377: śāntikāmi mukhaṃ yat syād dīrghaṃ khartaṃ ca vartulam /
T14nagcitpu:378: trikoṇaṃ vā prajānāñca sāmānyānāṃ bhaviṣyati // NCit_3.45 //
T14nagcitpu:380: tad vijñeyaṃ ca devānāṃ mukhasya mānamīdṛśam // NCit_3.46 //
T14nagcitpu:382: avikṣiptena gṛhyatāṃ manasā ca mahipate // NCit_3.47 //
T14nagcitpu:384: jñeyaṃ tad dvyaṅgulaṃ nūnaṃ skandhāyāmaḥ ṣaḍaṅgulaḥ /
T14nagcitpu:385: daighrye tvaṣṭāṅgulo jñeyo vakṣastu dviguṇaṃ smṛtam // NCit_3.48 //
T14nagcitpu:387: aṣṭādaśāṅgulā śroṇī ārohe kathitā budhaiḥ // NCit_3.49 //
T14nagcitpu:388: jatruto hṛdayaṃ yāvan na kuṭilaḥ pradeśakaḥ /
T14nagcitpu:390: nābhito meṭraparyantaṃ samānaṃ ca bhaved dhruvam // NCit_3.50 //
T14nagcitpu:392: mānaṃ ca dahiṇāvarttaṃ yavaikaṃ cucukaṃ smṛtam // NCit_3.51 //
T14nagcitpu:405: tathaiva madhyadeśī hi āroheṇa ṣaḍaṅguliḥ // NCit_3.56 //
T14nagcitpu:410: mṛdu karikarākāraṃ na kāryaṃ viṣamaṃ kvacit // NCit_3.58 //
T14nagcitpu:412: jaṅghāyāḥ paścimo bhāgaḥ suvṛtto 'lponnatau bhavet // NCit_3.59 //
T14nagcitpu:413: ucchrāyeṇa tu pārṣṇīnāṃ mānaṃ pañcāṅgulaṃ matam /
T14nagcitpu:418: pādasya bandhanaṃ syāttu dvyuṅgulaṃ bhūpadeśagam // NCit_3.62 //
T14nagcitpu:427: aṅguṣṭhāpekṣayā sthūlā ārohe tryaṅgulā matāḥ // NCit_3.66 //
T14nagcitpu:435: avraṇā mṛdavaḥ pūrṇāḥ yavamānena pūritāḥ // NCit_3.70 //
T14nagcitpu:440: itthaṃ caraṇamānaṃ syān mayā proktaṃ sucintitam // NCit_3.72 //
T14nagcitpu:442: talaṃ saptāṅgulaṃ dīrghaṃ vistāraḥ pañcakāṅguliḥ // NCit_3.73 //
T14nagcitpu:444: tarjanyā nyūnatā bodhyā parvārdhena susaṃmatā // NCit_3.74 //
T14nagcitpu:448: aṅguṣṭhe dve tu parvaṇī samenaika yavo bhavet // NCit_3.76 //
T14nagcitpu:451: āyāmo 'ṣṭayavaḥ kārya ārohastu yavā nava // NCit_3.77 //
T14nagcitpu:458: parvārdhena mitāḥ kāryā nakhāḥ sūkṣmāṃ nakhāgrakāḥ /
T14nagcitpu:459: sṛṣyante ca yavādṛśaḥ parvatarekhā tvadoṣabhāk // NCit_3.81 //
T14nagcitpu:460: parvaṃ dīrghaṃ ca vṛtaṃ ca karatalasuśobhanam /
T14nagcitpu:461: talau padmasamau raktau karasyaivaṃ vidhānataḥ // NCit_3.82 //
T14nagcitpu:463: rekhātrayaṃ kare proktaṃ raktavarṇaṃ suśobhanam // NCit_3.83 //
T14nagcitpu:466: sukhadaṃ cāru susparśaṃ kuryāt karatalaṃ śubham // NCit_3.84 //
T14nagcitpu:467: samantān māṃsapūrṇaṃ vai nāṛī dṛśyā kadāpi na /
T14nagcitpu:468: hastapṛṣṭhaṃ sadā snigdham unnataṃ ca bhaved dhruvam /
T14nagcitpu:469: sūkṣmā aṅgulijālā hi sundaraṃ ca tanustathā // NCit_3.85 //
T14nagcitpu:473: bāhūnāṃ mānamārohaṃ dhīman śṛṇu vadāni te // NCit_3.87 //
T14nagcitpu:474: ubhayostu tathā bāhvīr mānaṃ kuryād yathāvidhi /
T14nagcitpu:476: aṣṭādaśa prabāhośca bāhoścāpi tathaiva ca // NCit_3.88 //
T14nagcitpu:478: āyāmo bāhubhāgasya jñeyaṃ pañcāṅgulaṃ sadā // NCit_3.89 //
T14nagcitpu:480: viśālo varttulākāraḥ suspaṣṭoraṃśo bhavet punaḥ // NCit_3.90 //
T14nagcitpu:483: hastau na jānuparyantau dīrdhau sūkṣrmau ca sundarau /
T14nagcitpu:490: yāni purvaṃ na coktāni tāni tubhyaṃ vadāmyaham // NCit_3.95 //
T14nagcitpu:495: āyāme cāṅgulīnāṃ hī saṃkhyā yāyād navānvitā // NCit_3.97 //
T14nagcitpu:497: pṛṣṭhamadhyaḥ ṣaḍaṅgulir urdhve tu viṃśatirmatā // NCit_3.98 //
T14nagcitpu:499: puruṣāṇāmidaṃ mānaṃ strīṇāṃ bhāgaḥ sa eva hi /
T14nagcitpu:504: caturaṅgulaṃ sthānaṃ syāt pāyustu dvyuṅgulaṃ matam // NCit_3.101 //
T14nagcitpu:512: varṇasya lakṣaṇaṃ caiva devamukhe na dīyate // NCit_3.104 //
T14nagcitpu:514: dadhimuktābjavacchuklāḥ svacchāḥ śvetā himā iva // NCit_3.105 //
T14nagcitpu:516: ārohe triyavā jñeyā āyāme yavayugmakāḥ // NCit_3.106 //
T14nagcitpu:517: dantamūlaṃ tathā tālu jihvāsīmā ca lohitam /
T14nagcitpu:523: navārdhaparṇavaccāruḥ mukhe vai vitato bhavet // NCit_3.109 //
T14nagcitpu:525: megharavasya gambhīrā vāṇī proktā sulakṣaṇā // NCit_3.110 //
T14nagcitpu:533: jaṅghāsu kaṇṭhagaṇḍeṣu keśā na syurmahātmanām // NCit_3.114 //
T14nagcitpu:536: vakṣasthalaṃ nṛpāṇāṃ ca śobhitaṃ syāt sulakṣaṇam // NCit_3.115 //
T14nagcitpu:537: devabhūtamanuṣyāṇāṃ mukhe śmaśru na roma ca // NCit_3.116 //
T14nagcitpu:545: uttamaḥ puruṣo jñeyaḥ lakṣmaṇaṃ cakravarttinaḥ // NCit_3.120 //
T14nagcitpu:550: veśadṛśāṃ gatiṃ cātha atikramya ca sarveṣām /
T14nagcitpu:552: gatirasya bhavedrājan sarveṣāṃ ca manoramā // NCit_3.123 //
T14nagcitpu:556: samantāt kiraṇāvṛtaḥ rājā lekhyaḥ kṛśaḥ sadā // NCit_3.125 //
T14nagcitpu:558: śarīraṃ yasya rājendra lakṣaṇaṃ cakravarttinaḥ // NCit_3.126 //
T14nagcitpu:561: bhrūvoḥ kaṇṭhasya bhālasya saundaryaṃ hi mukhasya ca // NCit_3.127 //
T14nagcitpu:563: cārvoṣṭaṃ raktimāpūrṇaṃ svacchā dantā nabho yathā // NCit_3.128 //
T14nagcitpu:564: dīrdhottama ca pakṣma hi snigdhavarṇaṃ bhavettathā /
T14nagcitpu:565: nīlaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ca dīrghaṃ ca cakṣuḥ syāt sumanoharam /
T14nagcitpu:566: bhrūvau dīptau sadā jñeyau netrānandavidhāyakau // NCit_3.129 //
T14nagcitpu:574: dakṣiṇāvartino nābhiḥ gabhīrā syād yathāyatham // NCit_3.133 //
T14nagcitpu:576: samantāt maṇḍalākāraḥ ābhādṛśyā bhaved dhruvam // NCit_3.134 //
T14nagcitpu:578: mukheṣu connatā jñeyā gulpho 'dṛśpo bhavet tathā // NCit_3.135 //
T14nagcitpu:581: pādapṛṣṭomṛdū syātāṃ komalau haritau smṛtau // NCit_3.136 //
T14nagcitpu:587: tejasvī vīryavān rājan cakravarttī sadā bhavet /
T14nagcitpu:589: dehe jaṅghopajaṅghā ca bhṛśaṃ vikaśitā bhavet /
T14nagcitpu:590: suhastau caraṇau syātāṃ tathā parva ca dṛśyate // NCit_3.140 //
T14nagcitpu:592: śobhitau ca bhujau syātāṃ deho mānānvito bhavet // NCit_3.141 //
T14nagcitpu:595: cārudeho mahīpateḥ cakravartī sa ucyate // NCit_3.142 //
T14nagcitpu:598: upayukteṣu sarveṣu parimāṇaṃ tu yatra ca /
T14nagcitpu:599: tatra svāṅgulinā kāryaṃ mānaṃ sarvatra karmaṇi // NCit_3.144 //
T14nagcitpu:601: vidhinā parimāṇena sammpannaṃ śobhitaṃ bhavet // NCit_3.145 //
T14nagcitpu:604: pratimā sā parityaktā suradevaiḥ sadā khalu // NCit_3.146 //
T14nagcitpu:605: piśācā rākṣasā bhūtā vasanti tvarita tathā /
T14nagcitpu:606: śobhitān nāśayanti ca amaṅgalaṃ bhayaṃ bhavet // NCit_3.147 //
T14nagcitpu:608: yathecchaṃ vai vibhaktavyaṃ caturbhāgena mukhyataḥ // NCit_3.148 //
T14nagcitpu:613: apriyo na yathā yāyāt tathā mānaṃ vicārayet /
T14nagcitpu:614: kiṃ bhavet parimāṇena śarīraṃ cedasundaram // NCit_3.151 //
T14nagcitpu:615: caturṇāṃ ca tathā rājñāṃ parimāṇasya lakṣaṇam /
T14nagcitpu:616: brahmaṇā tu pradarśitaṃ vistaraṃ bravīmi te // NCit_3.152 //
T14nagcitpu:617: sarvasya lekhane granthe vistāro bhavati dhruvam /
T14nagcitpu:618: tena trasyanti cālpajñā aśrutikāraṇān nanu // NCit_3.153 //
T14nagcitpu:622: tubhyaṃ pradarśayāmi ced gacched grantho viśālatām // NCit_3.155 //
T14nagcitpu:625: uttamapuruṣādīnāṃ tena mānaṃ dhruvaṃ bhavet // NCit_3.156 //
T14nagcitpu:626: ato buddhayā suniścitya bhadro lekhyo vicārayan /
T14nagcitpu:627: sa ca bhavet samucchrāye ṣaḍuttaraśatāṅgulam // NCit_3.157 //
T14nagcitpu:635: ucchrāyo navarat strīṇā jñeya ekāṅguliḥ kṛśaḥ /
T14nagcitpu:639: āroho nāpriyo yāyāt tathā mānaṃ vidhīyatām // NCit_3.162 //
T14nagcitpu:642: nārīṇāṃ parimāṇaṃ ca sarvaṃ śṛṇu krameṇa hi // NCit_3.163 //
T14nagcitpu:643: rājñāṃ yathā pradarśitaṃ mānena ca tathāyutam /
